item.title: Lark basic explanation (Python, Lark makes a shell-like guy)
item.description: ## First I’m a programming beginner and a pretty ignorant man, so I don’t know various names and ambiguous expressions like “*** Natsu” are used, but please forgive me. Things to do I want to make something that works in a bash-like way of writing (I don’t know what I say)! I made it. The created program parses and executes the following script and returns the result. rand -s3 a b c + say def | replace e E (The result will be something like b a cd Ef)
